creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
description: brown and white geometrically patterned vertical stripes separated by thin rust stripe; on front: heavy horiontal lines of seeds, 12-1/2" wide--white seeds form horizontal bands; three narrow bands; oval shape filled with raspberry and lime green thread balls; two wide bands of all seeds; fringe on bottom
dimension: 26 1/2 x 27 in. (67.31 x 68.58 cm) (without fringe, at shoulder)
title: Woman's Tunic
